title: Salmon salad with Thai dressing
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons fish sauce', '4 tablespoons lime juice', '1 dessertspoon dark brown soft sugar', '4 red chillies, chopped', '675g (1 1/2 lb) salmon fillet', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 red onion, thinly sliced', '1 large tomato, chopped', 'handful chopped fresh basil', '1 head cos lettuce']
